resources.string: Audio filters are still a test version, so downloads are disabled.

An innovative audio recording application that offers an exceptional user experience by allowing the application of a variety of voice filters in real time. With advanced features such as Speed Up, Slowed and other custom audio effects, our app gives users full control over their recording experience, allowing them to create high-quality content easily and efficiently. Whether creating podcasts, professional recordings or simply adding a creative touch to your audio clips, our voice recorder with filters is the perfect tool for any audio enthusiast.
Please enter a valid file name. Only letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens are allowed.
